title: IN THE SOUTH AMERICAN WAY!
text:
Only registered TrekEarth members may write critiques. Photographer's Note 
Carmen Miranda was one of the most important Brazilian singers when the II War begun and USA wanted Brazil were at its side in the war. Because this Carmen Miranda was invited to Hollywood and was transformed in one of the most famous artists of the world wide in those days. I spent some time trying to find her prints in Sidewalk of Fame in Hollywood. Carmem Miranda era a mais importante cantora brasileira quando a Segunda Guerra explodiu e os Americanos queriam o Brasil a seu lado. Por conta disto a cantora foi convidada a virar atriz em Hollywood e se transformou numa das artistas mais famosas do mundo inteiro. Demorei a encontrar as suas marcas na cal√ßada da fama de Hollywood. 
Nobody has marked this note useful
